backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, study materials, assignments, exams, attendance, announcements, and access-controlled CRUD functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented branding and logo-update features with related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of various frontend files describing UI screens, components, styling, and navigation behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base overrides defining OKLCH color variables and dark-mode mappings plus global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing section navigation, theming, layout, and global UI elements like header, nav, and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar providing section switching with icons and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top header showing branding and login/logout controls using Internet Identity and react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name and save a new user profile.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Provides loading skeleton, empty state, and error state UI components.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports centralized branding info like school name, location, and logo path.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/auth.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/dashboard.ts: Provides hooks to fetch student profiles, exam results, and notifications via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/discipline.ts: Supplies a hook to fetch attendance records for a student.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/education.ts: Contains hooks for fetching study materials, assignments, exams, exam results, and announcements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context providing login, logout, and identity management with AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardSc: Renders the student dashboard, handling authentication, fetching profile, exam results, notifications, and displaying recent data summaries.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Attendance: Displays attendance records with authentication checks, summary stats, and a sorted list of daily attendance entries.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/BehaviorUp: Shows behavior updates, requiring login and otherwise displaying an empty-state message.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Discipline: Provides a tabbed interface for discipline-related sections including rules, attendance, behavior, and guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/Guidelines: Lists school guidelines and policies in styled cards with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/discipline/RulesCodeS: Displays the school code of conduct and a list of detailed school rules.
frontend/src/pages/education/Announcemen: Shows full details of a selected announcement with date and a back button.
Fetches and displays announcements sorted by date, allowing selection to view details.
frontend/src/pages/education/AssignmentD: Shows detailed information about a selected assignment including class, due date, and description.
frontend/src/pages/education/Assignments: Displays assignments with class filtering, sorting by due date, and navigation to a detailed assignment view.
frontend/src/pages/education/EducationSc: Main education hub with tab navigation between materials, assignments, exams, and announcements.
Shows detailed information for a single exam with subject, class, date, and description.
frontend/src/pages/education/ExamsList.t: Lists exams with class filtering, schedules/results tabs, and navigation to exam details.
frontend/src/pages/education/StudyMateri: Displays a study materialâ€™s subject, class, description, and optional downloadable resource.
Lists study materials filtered by class with navigation to detailed material view.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Renders the home screen with branding, hero section, and quick navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/notices/CircularDetai: Shows detailed view of a circular including title, date, and full message.
frontend/src/pages/notices/CircularsList: Renders a list of static circulars with clickable cards to view each in detail.
frontend/src/pages/notices/EventUpdateDe: Displays full details of a selected event update with title, date, description, and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/notices/EventUpdatesL: Shows a list of event updates with preview cards and allows selecting an event to view its detailed page.
frontend/src/pages/notices/HolidayList.t: Renders a sorted list of holidays with dates and labels, falling back to an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/pages/notices/NoticesScreen: Main notices screen providing tabs for circulars, holidays, and event updates.
frontend/src/pages/sports/AchievementsGa: Displays a gallery of sports achievements with images and titles.
frontend/src/pages/sports/ActivitiesFaci: Lists available sports activities and facilities with icons and brief descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/sports/FitnessTrainin: Shows a weekly fitness training schedule with activities, times, and levels.
frontend/src/pages/sports/SportsScreen.t: Main sports screen offering tabs for activities, events, achievements, and fitness.
frontend/src/pages/sports/TournamentEven: Displays detailed information about a selected sports tournament event with date, location, and description.
frontend/src/pages/sports/TournamentsEve: Renders a list of hardcoded sports tournament events and shows a detail view when an event is selected.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and custom utilities for the project.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, existing features, issues, and image needs for the PKM school app.
